about_the_game:
Become a Ninja Master

Start your adventure as a Ninja in this incremental game, defeat incoming enemies with a well-timed Katana Slash, research new technologies and build up your own village.


Recruit and Conquer

Embark on an enemy controlled island to establish your very own settlement. Recruit legendary heroes and send them out on missions to conquer enemy provinces to unite the land.

Collect a zoo

Collect and befriend various pets that will help you out on your adventures. Have your friend by your side to raise your mutual bond through your journeys and make your friends even more powerful.

Key Features

  • Defeat incoming enemies, collect coins, earn gold
  • Build up your village to earn even more gold even while you are offline!
  • Buy Research Upgrades to increase your power
  • Ascend and learn epic and permanent Skill Upgrades
  • Collect pets and award them with treats
  • Recruit heroes and unite the land
  • Perfect various Challenge levels
  • Complete Quests for rewards
  • Solve weekly riddles
  • Unlock hundreds of Achievements
  • Unlock characters and customize them with dyes
  • Crossplatform cloud saving - take your game on the go!

Roadmap for future:

  • More Upgrades and Ascension Skills
  • More Achievements
  • Forgeable Artifacts
  • Your very own dojo to customize and to display your achievements
  • Your idea? Share it on the Discord

highlighted.name: The Numbers, what do they mean?
So much to do so much to see

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+, Mint 17.1+
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit supported Mac OS
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Tap Ninja - Idle game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Defeat enemies, earn gold, upgrade your village, become a Ninja Master!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Greek, Thai, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Swedish, Vietnamese, Finnish, Romanian, Polish, Hungarian, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Czech, Italian, Danish, Ukrainian, Hindi, Indonesian, Latvian, Serbian, Lithuanian, Arabic, Hebrew
